edu.sjsu.cmpe275.lms.dao

Interface BookDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookDaoImpl

    @EnableScheduling
 @Transactional
public interface BookDao
    The BookDAO for the CRUD operations on Book Entity

        Add a book to database
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addBook

        boolean addBook(java.lang.String isbn,
                java.lang.String author,
                java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String callnumber,
                java.lang.String publisher,
                java.lang.String year_of_publication,
                java.lang.String location,
                int num_of_copies,
                java.lang.String current_status,
                java.lang.String keywords,
                byte[] image,
                User user)
        Add a book to database
        Parameters:
        isbn - 10 or 13 digit ISBN code, must be uniqur
        author - Author of the book
        title - Title of the book, must be unique
        callnumber - Call Number
        publisher - Publisher of the book
        year_of_publication - Year of publication
        location - Location of the book in library
        num_of_copies - Number of copies
        current_status - Current Status
        keywords - Keywords
        image - Bytes as image
        Returns:
        true if add successful, false if failed
